    • 字段详细资料

      • as

        public static final int as
        The type of binding. If this value is not specified, the type will be inferred from the type of the "to" target view. Mandatory. The type can be one of:
        • string, The content of the column is interpreted as a string.
        • image, The content of the column is interpreted as a blob describing an image.
        • image-uri, The content of the column is interpreted as a URI to an image.
        • drawable, The content of the column is interpreted as a resource id to a drawable.
        • A fully qualified class name, corresponding to an implementation of android.widget.Adapters.CursorBinder.

        Must be a string value, using '\\;' to escape characters such as '\\n' or '\\uxxxx' for a unicode character.

        This may also be a reference to a resource (in the form "@[package:]type:name") or theme attribute (in the form "?[package:][type:]name") containing a value of this type.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • column

        public static final int column
        The name of the column to select. Mandatory.

        Must be a string value, using '\\;' to escape characters such as '\\n' or '\\uxxxx' for a unicode character.

        This may also be a reference to a resource (in the form "@[package:]type:name") or theme attribute (in the form "?[package:][type:]name") containing a value of this type.

      • layout

        public static final int layout
        Layout resource used to display each row from the cursor. Mandatory.

        Must be a reference to another resource, in the form "@[+][package:]type:name" or to a theme attribute in the form "?[package:][type:]name".

        另请参阅:

      • withClass

        public static final int withClass
        The transformation class, an implementation of android.widget.Adapters.CursorTransformation. Mandatory if "withExpression" is not specified.

        Must be a string value, using '\\;' to escape characters such as '\\n' or '\\uxxxx' for a unicode character.

        This may also be a reference to a resource (in the form "@[package:]type:name") or theme attribute (in the form "?[package:][type:]name") containing a value of this type.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • withExpression

        public static final int withExpression
        The transformation expression. Mandatory if "withClass" is not specified.

        Must be a string value, using '\\;' to escape characters such as '\\n' or '\\uxxxx' for a unicode character.

        This may also be a reference to a resource (in the form "@[package:]type:name") or theme attribute (in the form "?[package:][type:]name") containing a value of this type.
